channel.title: Simple Help Needed Thank you come again
channel.description: Ok so guys here's the deal I got this private server all set up and i'm able to play it and everything i also have it forwarded. Only problem is i can't see to find out how to get my friend to play on it...Do i like send him the folder that has the server and client on it?But then he will be able to edit everything right? or is there a way to get him to play on it?

item.title: Simple Help Needed Thank you come again
item.dc:creator: @triger545 triger545
item.description:
@triger545 wrote:

Applet_sub1

Client.java

and Launch.java. I think thats it.

Read full topic
item.source: Simple Help Needed Thank you come again

item.title: Simple Help Needed Thank you come again
item.dc:creator: @elderdemons elderdemons
item.description:
@elderdemons wrote:

Thanks for the response but here are a few things that help you to help me no the client isn’t a ip changer and when i go into the client folder i found a this file named server that was on a notepad but there wasn’t anything i could change inside it. I even pressed the ctrl+f 127.0.0.1 but found nothing. However, I did manage to go in some folders and found this client file that was also in a notepad they also had the client that was a .java but when i try to edit it… that comes up with a bunch of weird symbols that made absolutely no sense. Anyways when i edit the client that was in a notepad i found the 127.0.0.1 which i changed to my ip. Hope i didn’t lose you but my question is where are the other files that is IMPORTANT to change the ip for. one more thing what do you mean by messing up the compiler? OH also Say if i was to send my client to my friend…ok How will it be possible for it to work if i have to have the server files and the clients files to play it? Sorry for all the question I just like to learn these types on thing’s

Read full topic
item.source: Simple Help Needed Thank you come again

item.title: Simple Help Needed Thank you come again
item.dc:creator: @triger545 triger545
item.description:
@triger545 wrote:

Heres how:
Step 1: Send him your client. If your client is a IP changer client then you won’t have to do the next step. Otherwise do step 2.

Step 2: Make sure that your client has your IP set so when you turn it on it connects to you.

Step 3 If your client is IP changer then tell him your IP. Then he logs in and complete!

If you don’t know how to set your client IP then look it up. If this still doesn’t work then you probably didn’t port forward correctly.

Sorry if this wasn’t very descriptive.

Read full topic
item.source: Simple Help Needed Thank you come again

Only problem is i can’t see to find out how to get my friend to play on it…Do i like send him the folder that has the server and client on it?But then he will be able to edit everything right? or is there a way to get him to play on it?[/quote]But that doens’t matter right? Or just make an copy of your CLIENT then mess up the compiler.

Read full topic
